article:
I know my brother better than anyone else in the world. Since the moment of his birth,I've been part of his life. I had spent seven  _  years in the world with the attention of those around me. But when Rohan was born, life  _ . Suddenly I had to  _  my toys and there were no more bedtime stories or my own choice of food.
Finally, I felt my  _  at my mother. The poor baby had no idea what had made me so unhappy. Maybe he found me  _ , the only person in this house who did not like him. Whatever the reason was, he loved  _  me around. However, I seldom talked to him and  _  asked him to leave me alone.
Then all that changes. I hardly remember everything of that day six years ago,  _  I do remember that I was feeling very angry. Somehow my feet led me to my brother's bed. My hand, completely  _  from my mind, reached through the bars  . At once, he reached his small hand and softly touched  _ . And that was allI needed. Through all the unhappiness of the day, that one moment changed  _ .How could I hate someone who made me feel so important? For the  _  time, I saw my brother, not through the eyes of a child who was no longer favored  , but through the eyes of a  _ .To this day, I can't imagine life  _  my brother. It is unbelievable how much I have  _  about life from a seven-year-old boy. Above all, Rohan has taught me that one shouldn't care only for himself.
